name: Mr Meal
description:
You are newly employed agent and you work for an Agency investigating the mysterious Mr Meal. The first day you appeared in your office and right away you got your first mission: find out what is behind all Mr Meal's activities.
----------------------------------------------

What is this all about?

- Discover Mr Meal's story and find out what he's up to. The story is mainly given through dialogue but there are also documents that you can read.
- Experience adventures and relax with puzzles.
- Discover towns full of locals. There are also interesting side challenges.

The game is mostly based on dialogues and puzzle-arcade missions. There are also mini-games both as part of the main storyline and side activities.
